fr.pcreations.labs.RESTDroid.core

Class DefaultRetryAtDelayedTimeFailBehavior

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.pcreations.labs.RESTDroid.core.FailBehavior
      • fr.pcreations.labs.RESTDroid.core.DefaultRetryAtDelayedTimeFailBehavior

  • public class DefaultRetryAtDelayedTimeFailBehavior
extends FailBehavior
    Behavior to retry a request every minute by default until the request is successful

    If you want to change the default time value just extend this class and call setDelayedTime(long) in failAction(WebService, ArrayList) to set the time you want

    Version:
    0.8
    Author:
    Pierre Criulanscy
